name: Koluan's Diner
description:
[PLEASE PLAY FULL SCREEN FOR FULL EXPERIENCE]

How-to-play:

  • Control with “A”, “D” key and your mouse.
  • Position yourself nicely at the diner’s stall.
  • Wait for customers to arrive, as indicated by the UI on your right.
  • Once an order is placed, clicked on the corresponding button with your mouse to make the food.
  • Drag the on your tray and press the big orange “GO!” button.
  • Race to the table with their order before the time runs out.
  • The layout of the tables is: 5-3-1-MainStall-2-4-6.
  • Meet the level’s customer served target to advance to the next level, or you’re fired.

Life in the future is hard. Aliens are everywhere and us ordinary humans are exotic now. As Earth opens its arms to embrace the influx of extraterrestrial tourism, alien-exclusive services become more and more prevalent. If you think waiting tables is boring, why not join us at Koluan’s DINER, where the sky’s the limit. (Yes, in all caps, it’s more exotic.)

It was literal, the “sky is the limit” thing. A waiter at Koluan’s DINER is expected to ride a unicycle on a tight rope to serve food twice the size of their head to aliens comfortably situated on top of mountain-high pillars. As if being a waiter isn’t precarious enough…

Well, you have gotten used to it, the balance, the height, the big appetite of weird-looking creatures. Still, anything would beat the guilt of wasting tons of food falling on God-knows-whose head. “One day”, you thought to yourself, “I would leave this hellish place and get a more stable job.” But hey, there are still mouths to feed, and that unicycle isn’t going to ride itself…
